#include<iostream>
#include<vector>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdio.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	char ch;
	int t,n,r,i,m,num;
	cin>>t;
	
	while(t--)
	{
		i=0;num=0;
		cin>>n>>r;
		while(n>0)
		{
			m=n%10;
			num=num+m*pow(r,i);i++;
			n=n/10;
		}
		ch=num;
		printf("%c",ch);
	}
	return 0;
}
